Sports & Physical Achievements

Celebrating excellence in sports and physical activities, fostering teamwork, discipline, and healthy competition.

Student Participation

Recent Sports Achievements

Our students have excelled in various sports competitions at district, zonal, and state levels.

2023-24

State Level Kabaddi Championship

Our school Kabaddi team won the State Level Championship, defeating 32 teams from across Karnataka. The team displayed exceptional teamwork and strategy throughout the tournament.

Championship Achievement
2023-24

District Athletics Meet - 5 Gold Medals

Our athletes secured 5 gold medals, 3 silver medals, and 4 bronze medals in various track and field events at the District Athletics Meet. Special mention to Arjun Singh who broke the district record in 800m race.

Championship Achievement
2023-24

Zonal Cricket Tournament Champions

Our cricket team emerged as champions in the Zonal Cricket Tournament, winning all matches with commanding performances. Captain Rahul Kumar was named Player of the Tournament for his all-round performance.

Championship Achievement
2023-24

State Chess Championship - Individual Gold

Priya Sharma from 10th grade won the gold medal in the State Chess Championship, qualifying for the National level competition. She remained undefeated throughout the tournament.

Championship Achievement

Sports Facilities

Our school provides excellent sports facilities to nurture talent and promote physical fitness.

Cricket Ground

Full-size cricket ground with practice nets

Football Field

Standard size football field with goalposts

Basketball Court

Concrete court with professional hoops

Volleyball Court

Two standard volleyball courts

Kabaddi Court

Regulation size kabaddi court

Kho-Kho Ground

Standard kho-kho playing area

Athletics Track

200m track for running events

Indoor Games Room

Facilities for chess, carrom, and table tennis
